description: What does it take to make the most controversial, award-winning, big-budget gay adult film of 2005? Find out in this hilarious documentary that takes you behind the scenes of Michael Lucas' "Dangerous Liaisons," the GayVN award-winner for "Best Picture" in 2005! With hot naked guys, drama between the stars, steamy on-set stories, and plenty of laughs, "More Dangerous: The Making of Michael Lucas' Dangerous Liaisons" is sure to entertain!
series: More Dangerous: The Making of "Dangerous Liaisons"
title: "More Dangerous"
